Body:
Description: +++++
2025_0422 Meeting:
+++++
1) Specifically, for Qumulo the issue that we found today, see the article, it looks as though the following permission was not granted to the collection account = "Group membership in the Data-Administrators role".  The permission had to be granted on both nodes (or are they separate servers).

2) Now the scan is working.

Qumulo Target Requirements
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/AccessAnalyzer_12.0/page/Content/Config/Qumulo/Overview.htm

+++++
Access & Sensitive Data Auditing Permissions
The credentials used by the Access Analyzer scans must have the following permissions on the target host:

Group membership in the Data-Administrators role

NOTE: These permissions are in addition to those needed to either deploy applet scans for running scans in proxy mode with applet or installing the File System Proxy Service Permissions for running scans in proxy mode as a service. See the File System Scan Options topic for additional information.
+++++

What We've Learned Updated: +++++
